name: tikka
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in South Asian cooking, a mixture of spices and yogurt (= slightly sour, thick milk) used in preparing meat, cheese, etc. for some dishes and in the names of these dishes: chicken tikka
in South Asian cooking, meat in small pieces
